text:
For Benga
Excellent service and a very nice and friendly waiter. 

Thank you for a perfect meal and great experience

Best Bistro in Town
Every time i came to visit this place, be it for business lunch and after work dinner & drinks, my experiences were always superb, from food to excellent service. I invited clients from Abu Dhabi to this place once, since then they have frequented the...restaurant. Thanks to the ever accommodating Manager Andy and, to Ron for your inimitable service. Highly recommended.

Benga was amazing!
We love couqley and are frequent guests, Benga made our visit even better! Great service and great food. Will be back!

Ms
Ordered the escargot and muscles, Benga catered to the family quickly and attentively. Would recommend to a friend

Couqley Monday night
We had an amazing experience, the food was amazing and the service was wonderful. Benga was very friendly and polite.
Thx

Good stuff
We had a great time  with awesome food, the steak was great, so is the wine. I recommend the chocolate fondant  for dessert. 
Thanks Kenneth for serving us

RON IS THE BEST
Definitely the friendliest, kindest and efficient surface I‚Äôve had in Dubai & food was great!
Thank you Ron!

Amazing service!
We came for a birthday dinner , and we had the best service from this lovely waiter called Ron! 
I super recommend the Sea bream and the dessert pain perdu, definitely coming back!

Ron is awesome!
Our server really gave us the best energy during my favorite offer from Couqley, the steak & frites for 2. Quality meal with quality service!

Really good customer service
Went to have lunch with a few friends, the customer service from our server Ron was excellent. I had the steak frites, which was amazing, and the chocolate fondue was good too. Our server gave us blankets because we felt cold and was really funny...as well. It was overall a great experience and would recommend to anyone.

Best customer service ever
Came here to enjoy a french meal with some friends which graduated from french class together and was extremely surprised by the customer service. the food was delicious (we had the steak frites) and the portions were great. the customer service was amazing too especially...Ron, our waiter was amazing and so friendly and funny and would genuinely come here again just for the customer service (when we were cold we were given blankets) it felt like we were genuinely being taken care of. 10/10

Quintavius
Best service ever from RON, loved the food, bread was great, greasy service, loved everything, really great

Nice place and great service
really nice place and friendly service.
Benga served us and he was really professional and had a friendly approach at the same time .

Sunday dinner
Benga served us. Steaks were fantastic. Come here when you want to feel both pampered and at home. üëçüèºüëçüèº

Neighbourhood Friendly French restaurant
Great place for French food. Cocktails and wine on point. Brilliant service. Talk to Benga for great suggestions and service.
